Control Name: USER-INSTALLED SOFTWARE | ALERTS FOR UNAUTHORIZED INSTALLATIONS
Control Statement: The information system alerts [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] when the unauthorized installation of software is detected.Supplemental Guidance:  Related controls: CA-7, SI-4.
